column4: hi, i've got problems after upgrading to gutsy, gdm doesn't start, gnome also doesn't and any other gnome application does also not start
hi oetzi
i get following message if i like to start agnome application symbol lookup error: /usr/lib/libgdk-x11-2.0.so.0: undefined symbol: g_once_init_enter_impl
it seems to be a problem with glib causee if i want to dpkg-rconfigure gdm i get This build of Glib was compiled with glib 2.14.0, but is currently running with 2.13.1, which is too old
current glib version in gutsy is 2.14
i have 2.14.1 installed
do you have stuff in /usr/local/ perhaps?
in /user/local/lib, yes
is that the problm?
maybe
what do you have in there?
http://pastebin.ca/743403
yes, i would say that's probably the problem then
so rename them?
why do you need them at all?
don't know, i didn't put them there
stuff in /usr/local/ has to be created by the user.  The package manager does not touch that location
k, but it wasn't me too, but thanks a lot that seems to be the problem!
gdmjust started!
great
thanks! gnoem works again, seems a bit broken but i think i'll get it now! thanks a lot
